## GAD-7 vs PSD

GAD-7 vs PSD While the assessment of psychological disorders depends on a variety of factors, two key tools used in the process include the Generalized Anxiety Disorder Assessment (GAD-7) and the Psychopathy Screening Device (20-item) (PSD). However, the aforementioned assessments differ in the nature of their content and their areas of focus; making it crucial for psychologists to understand the differences between them. This is where Harmony, a powerful software for psychologists, comes into picture. GAD-7 vs PSD vary immensely, but with the help of Harmony you can harmonise and compare these two instruments. GAD-7 mainly concentrates on the severity of general anxiety disorder symptoms over a two-week period using a set of seven questions. On the other hand, the 20-item PSD is more attentive towards psychopathic traits, evaluating areas such as insincere charm, selfishness and lack of empathy amongst others. With the aid of Harmony and its advanced natural language processing and generative AI models, psychologists can not only thread the differences between the GAD-7 vs PSD, but also solidify the similarity and connection between the two. Analyzing the differences between GAD-7 vs PSD using Harmony not only saves time but also helps in improving the accuracy of the conclusions drawn from the assessments. Harmony can efficiently handle the harmonisation of two different scales across different languages, making the work of psychologists easier. In order to make use of both GAD-7 and PSD, use Harmony to compare them effectively and accurately. A single software that assists in understanding these two crucial psychological tools in a comprehensive and efficient manner.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and PSD

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and PSD into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just PSD into Harmony</a> - compare PSD with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
